name: update daily report when access from menu

children.description: When I open submenu Register of menu Daily Report
Then The system should show table daily report history has data
When In Register daily report, I choose row 0 in table daily report history
Then The system should show daily report can update
When In Register daily report, I choose category 'Other works'

And I update Daily report with data below
| content |
| Verify update daily report when change from category business to other works |
Then The system should show message save daily report successfully
When In Register daily report, I choose row 0 in table daily report history

Then The system should show details like below
| content |
| Verify update daily report when change from category business to other works |

When I update Daily report with data below
| companyName | content | branch | personInCharge | department | businessType | purpose | reminder | reminderFrom | reminderTo | projectFlag | openFlag |
| CIJ | Verify update daily report | 北海道 | 庭田次長 | atv | ソフトウェア | クレーム | ON | 2016/10/19 | 2016/10/20 | ON | ON |
Then The system should show message save daily report successfully
When In Register daily report, I choose row 0 in table daily report history

Then The system should show details like below
| companyName | content | branch | personInCharge | department | businessType | purpose | reminder | reminderFrom | reminderTo | projectFlag | openFlag |
| CIJ | Verify update daily report | 北海道 | 庭田次長 | atv | ソフトウェア | クレーム | ON | 2016/10/19 | 2016/10/20 | ON | ON |

userStory.narrative:
As a user
I want to access register daily report
So I can add or update daily report

title: update daily report when access from menu
